text: <@UKGV272KS> thank you for the help. I’m still stuck.. Not able to figure it out. I have done the following now: I want to prevent that these section are put under each other when the px width goes below 490. Could anyone give an example of what I should use as code?
Hi everyone, I really need your help with this one. Anyone available?

Hey everyone! I'm trying to customize my url image adding an utm_source query at the end of the link, but it seems not found.
Screenshots are attached to this thread...
As you can see, I've tried what's shown at the first image, then you can check my url at the second one (which ends with "png" cause it refers a link to a specific image), finally I've got the 404 error message...
thank you a lot for your time!
Have you tried removing the / so it's .png?utm... ?
Thank BJ for the help!
sorry!! I made it!! Thank you for your time, Courtney :heart:
Any help on my issue?
This is frustrating. Even the Unsubscribe link given to us is broken.
<p><a href="{{unsubscribe_link}}" style="text-decoration:underline;">Unsubscribe</a></p>
This doesn't work either.
And these are modules given to us by the HubSpot, not something we coded ourselves.
What is the issue exactly? `{{unsubscribe_link}}` is correct.
This doesn't lead to a page to unsubscribe from the list. It leads to our own website's non-existen link.
Not sure if the page has to be set for this module to work correctly but couldn't find anything in the docs.
Image doesn't work either. It works in the preview, not in the actual email sent. The src=url is different in preview and in the email.
In settings under Marketing > Email > Subscriptions, that is where the landing pages are set for unsubscribing/subscription preferences.
Have you tried a different image to see if it's only one image that is the issue? Have you tried an image that does not have spaces in the file name?
There is one but this module doesn't link to that, but our website.
You should reach out to support via live chat so they can look in your portal for you.
I did, they asked me to come here and ask for help.
`{{unsubscribe_link}}` is a HubSpot variable, and it's tied to "Subscription preferences page" in the settings.

<#CJ5DN6RKP|email-development> Is there a way to provide end user service emails without an unsubscribe option? These are emails directly related to what the user has done within our product. Is that an option in HubSpot?
You may want to look into <https://www.HubSpot.com/products/marketing/transactional-email>
